item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, November 20, 2024 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Foursquare Open Source Places: A new foundational dataset (87 points | 14 comments)
2. Tiny Glade 'built' its way to >600k sold in a month (345 points | 73 comments)
3. Discarded delights: The joy of ex-library books (10 points | 2 comments)
4. Let's Encrypt is 10 years old now (335 points | 113 comments)
5. FireDucks: Pandas but 100x Faster (29 points | 1 comment)
6. Understanding the BM25 full text search algorithm (119 points | 7 comments)
7. Webvm: Virtual Machine for the Web (165 points | 46 comments)
8. Epic Allows Internet Archive to Distribute Unreal and Unreal Tournament Forever (385 points | 89 comments)
9. SpaceX Super Heavy splashes down in the gulf, canceling chopsticks landing (240 points | 340 comments)
10. Blender 4.3 (192 points | 70 comments)
11. Using Erlang hot code updates (231 points | 44 comments)
12. 1-Bit AI Infrastructure (58 points | 8 comments)
13. Using uv with PyTorch (151 points | 42 comments)
14. Yhangry (YC W22) Is Hiring 2 Mid-Level Full-Stack Engineers ( | hide)
15. Meta Uses LLMs to Improve Incident Response (117 points | 13 comments)
16. Yi Peng 3 crossed both cables C-Lion 1 and BSC at times matching when they broke (98 points | 47 comments)
17. Open Riak – open, modern Riak fork (167 points | 59 comments)
18. Tiling with Three Polygons Is Undecidable (82 points | 16 comments)
19. Trivial REST server in various languages to compare (10 points | 8 comments)
20. Show HN: Physically accurate black hole simulation using your iPhone camera (269 points | 105 comments)
21. Why I hate the index finger (1980) (194 points | 69 comments)
22. Query Your Python Lists (38 points | 11 comments)
23. Hand Tracking for Mouse Input (181 points | 44 comments)
24. Unified Checkout: Streamlining Uber's Payment Ecosystem (21 points | discuss)
25. Recycled Server Components Bring More Sustainability (25 points | 9 comments)
26. Launch HN: Regatta Storage (YC F24) – Turn S3 into a local-like, POSIX cloud FS (565 points | 308 comments)
27. Bottles of OOP now available in Python (158 points | 37 comments)
28. The Data Engineering Handbook (167 points | 15 comments)
29. Apple Confirms Zero-Day Attacks Hitting macOS Systems (233 points | 84 comments)
30. Firefox nightly is running an experiment featuring a Fakespot feed on newtab (16 points | 9 comments)
